text: nim'ma hindina janangagalalli, bhumiyalli asantiyannu mereyadante janarannu tadeyuva sajjanaru (dodda sankhyeyalli) irabekittu. Adare antaha kevala kelavaru matra iddaru. Navu avarannu avarinda (dustarinda) raksisidevu. Akramigalu tamage nidalagidda sukha bhogagala hindeye biddiddaru. Avaru aparadhigalagiddaru
